00029 Map::~Map()
00030 {
00031     vector<BeadMap *>::iterator iter;
00032     for(iter=_maps.begin();iter!=_maps.end();++iter)
00033         delete (*iter);    
00034     _maps.clear();
00035 }
00036 
00037 void Map::Apply()
00038 {
00039     vector<BeadMap *>::iterator iter;
00040     for(iter=_maps.begin();iter!=_maps.end();++iter)
00041         (*iter)->Apply();
00042 }
00043 
00044 void Map_Sphere::Initialize(Molecule *in, Bead *out, Property *opts_bead, Property *opts_map) {
00045     BeadMap::Initialize(in, out, opts_bead, opts_map);
00046     
00047     vector<string> beads;
00048     vector<double> weights;
00049     vector<double> fweights;
00050 
00051     // get the beads
00052     string s(_opts_bead->get("beads").value());
00053     Tokenizer tok_beads(s, " \n\t");
00054     tok_beads.ToVector(beads);
00055 
00056     // get vector of weights
00057     Tokenizer tok_weights(_opts_map->get("weights").value(), " \n\t");
00058     tok_weights.ConvertToVector<double>(weights);
00059 
00060     // check weather weights and # beads matches
00061     if (beads.size() != weights.size())
00062         throw runtime_error(string("number of subbeads in " +
00063                 opts_bead->get("name").as<string>()
00064                 + " and number of weights in map "
00065                 + opts_map->get("name").as<string>() + " do not match"));
00066 
00067     // normalize the weights
00068     double norm = 1./ std::accumulate(weights.begin(), weights.end(), 0.);
00069     
00070     transform(weights.begin(), weights.end(), weights.begin(), bind2nd(multiplies<double>(), norm));
00071     // get the d vector if exists or initialize same as weights
00072     vector<double> d;
00073     if(_opts_map->exists("d")) {
00074         Tokenizer tok_weights(_opts_map->get("d").value(), " \n\t");
00075         tok_weights.ConvertToVector(d);
00076         // normalize d coefficients
00077         norm = 1./std::accumulate(d.begin(), d.end(), 0.);
00078         transform(d.begin(), d.end(), d.begin(), bind2nd(multiplies<double>(), norm));
00079     } else {
00080         // initialize force-weights with weights
00081         d.resize(weights.size());
00082         copy(weights.begin(), weights.end(), d.begin());
00083     }
00084 
00085     // check weather number of d coeffs is correct
00086     if (beads.size() != d.size()) {
00087         throw runtime_error(string("number of subbeads in " +
00088             opts_bead->get("name").as<string>()
00089             + " and number of d-coefficients in map "
00090             + opts_map->get("name").as<string>() + " do not match"));
00091     }
00092 
00093     fweights.resize(weights.size());
00094     // calculate force weights by d_i/w_i
00095     for(size_t i=0; i<weights.size(); ++i) {
00096         if(weights[i] == 0 && d[i]!=0) {
00097             throw runtime_error(
00098                 "A d coefficient is nonzero while weights is zero in mapping "
00099                 + opts_map->get("name").as<string>());
00100         }
00101         if(weights[i] != 0)
00102             fweights[i] = d[i] / weights[i];
00103         else
00104             fweights[i] = 0;        
00105     }
00106 
00107     for (size_t i = 0; i < beads.size(); ++i) {
00108         int iin = in->getBeadByName(beads[i]);
00109         if (iin < 0)
00110             throw std::runtime_error(string("mapping error: molecule " + beads[i] + " does not exist"));
00111         AddElem(in->getBead(iin), weights[i], fweights[i]);
00112     }
00113 }
00114 
00115 void Map_Sphere::Apply()
00116 {
00117     vector<element_t>::iterator iter;
00118     vec cg(0., 0., 0.), f(0.,0.,0.), vel(0.,0.,0.);
00119     bool bPos, bVel, bF;
00120     bPos=bVel=bF=false;
00121     _out->ParentBeads().clear();
00122 
00123     // the following is needed for pbc treatment
00124     Topology *top = _out->getParent();
00125     double max_dist = 0.5*top->ShortestBoxSize();
00126     vec r0 = vec(0,0,0);
00127     if(_matrix.size() > 0) {
00128         if(_matrix.front()._in->HasPos()) {
00129             r0=_matrix.front()._in->getPos();
00130         }
00131     }
00132 
00133     double M = 0;
00134 
00135     for(iter = _matrix.begin(); iter != _matrix.end(); ++iter) {
00136         Bead *bead = iter->_in;
00137         _out->ParentBeads().push_back(bead->getId());
00138         M+=bead->getM();
00139         if(bead->HasPos()) {
00140             vec r = top->BCShortestConnection(r0, bead->getPos());
00141             if(abs(r) > max_dist)
00142                 throw std::runtime_error("coarse-grained bead is bigger than half the box");
00143             cg += (*iter)._weight * (r+r0);
00144             bPos=true;
00145         }
00146         if(bead->HasVel()) {
00147             vel += (*iter)._weight * bead->getVel();
00148             bVel = true;
00149         }
00150         if(bead->HasF()) {
00151             f += (*iter)._force_weight * bead->getF();
00152             bF = true;
00153         }
00154     }
00155     _out->setM(M);
00156     if(bPos)
00157         _out->setPos(cg);
00158     if(bVel)
00159         _out->setVel(vel);
00160     if(bF)
00161         _out->setF(f);
00162 }
00163 
00165 void Map_Ellipsoid::Apply()
00166 {
00167     vector<element_t>::iterator iter;
00168     vec cg(0., 0., 0.), c(0., 0., 0.), f(0.,0.,0.), vel(0.,0.,0.);
00169     matrix m(0.);
00170      bool bPos, bVel, bF;
00171     bPos=bVel=bF=false;
00172 
00173     // the following is needed for pbc treatment
00174     Topology *top = _out->getParent();
00175     double max_dist = 0.5*top->ShortestBoxSize();
00176     vec r0 = vec(0,0,0);
00177     if(_matrix.size() > 0) {
00178         if(_matrix.front()._in->HasPos()) {            
00179             r0=_matrix.front()._in->getPos();
00180         }
00181     }
00182 
00183     int n;
00184     n = 0;
00185     _out->ParentBeads().clear();
00186     for(iter = _matrix.begin(); iter != _matrix.end(); ++iter) {
00187        Bead *bead = iter->_in;
00188        _out->ParentBeads().push_back(bead->getId());
00189        if(bead->HasPos()) {
00190             vec r = top->BCShortestConnection(r0, bead->getPos());
00191             if(abs(r) > max_dist)
00192                 throw std::runtime_error("coarse-grained bead is bigger than half the box");
00193             cg += (*iter)._weight * (r+r0);
00194             bPos=true;
00195         }
00196         if(bead->HasVel() == true) {
00197             vel += (*iter)._weight * bead->getVel();
00198             bVel = true;
00199         }
00200         if(bead->HasF()) {
00202             //f += (*iter)._weight * _in->getBeadF((*iter)._in);
00203             f += (*iter)._force_weight * bead->getF();
00204             bF = true;
00205         }
00206         
00207         if((*iter)._weight>0 && bead->HasPos()) {
00208             c += bead->getPos();
00209             n++;
00210         }
00211     }
00212     
00213     if(bPos)
00214         _out->setPos(cg);
00215     if(bVel)
00216         _out->setVel(vel);
00217     if(bF)
00218         _out->setF(f);
00219 
00220     if(!_matrix[0]._in->HasPos()) {
00221         _out->setU(vec(1.0,0,0));
00222         _out->setV(vec(.0,1,0));
00223         _out->setW(vec(.0,0,1));
00224         return;
00225     }
00226     
00227     // calculate the tensor of gyration
00228     c=c/(double)n;    
00229     for(iter = _matrix.begin(); iter != _matrix.end(); ++iter) {
00230         if((*iter)._weight == 0) continue;
00231         Bead *bead = iter->_in;
00232             vec v = bead->getPos() - c;
00233             //v = vec(1, 0.5, 0) * 0.*(drand48()-0.5)
00234             //    + vec(0.5, -1, 0) * (drand48()-0.5)
00235             //    + vec(0, 0, 1) * (drand48()-0.5);
00236         
00237             //Normalize the tensor with 1/number_of_atoms_per_bead
00238             m[0][0] += v.getX()*v.getX()/(double)_matrix.size();
00239             m[0][1] += v.getX()*v.getY()/(double)_matrix.size();
00240             m[0][2] += v.getX()*v.getZ()/(double)_matrix.size();
00241             m[1][1] += v.getY()*v.getY()/(double)_matrix.size();
00242             m[1][2] += v.getY()*v.getZ()/(double)_matrix.size();
00243             m[2][2] += v.getZ()*v.getZ()/(double)_matrix.size();
00244         
00245     }
00246     m[1][0] = m[0][1];
00247     m[2][0] = m[0][2];
00248     m[2][1] = m[1][2];
00249     
00250     // calculate the eigenvectors
00251     matrix::eigensystem_t es;
00252     m.SolveEigensystem(es);
00253     
00254     vec eigenv1=es.eigenvecs[0];
00255     vec eigenv2=es.eigenvecs[1];
00256     vec eigenv3=es.eigenvecs[2];
00257     
00258 /*    _out->seteigenvec1(eigenv1);
00259     _out->seteigenvec2(eigenv2);
00260     _out->seteigenvec3(eigenv3);
00261   */  
00262     
00263     vec u = es.eigenvecs[0];
00264     vec v = _matrix[1]._in->getPos() - _matrix[0]._in->getPos();
00265     v.normalize();
00266     
00267     _out->setV(v);
00268     
00269     vec w = _matrix[2]._in->getPos() - _matrix[0]._in->getPos();
00270     w.normalize();
00271     
00272     if((v^w)*u < 0) u=vec(0.,0.,0.)-u;
00273     _out->setU(u);
00274     
00275     //write out w
00276     w=u^v;
00277     w.normalize();
00278     _out->setW(w);
00279     
00280     //out.BeadV(_out) = v;
00281     
00282     //out.BeadW(_out) = es.eigenvecs[2];
00283 }
